page.title: 04KILMINGTON
page.content: Of the two villages and one hamlet in this area, Kilmington is the largest. The children in our school did a survey of the village. The children in the Junior class organised themselves into five groups and each group took an area of the village to investigate. We decided to conduct our survey by means of interviews, and drew up a sheet of questions which each person interviewed would be asked. There are 309 households in Kilmington, and we have 155 included in our survey. At the remaining dwellings, either no-one was in during the days when we called, or the people did not wish to answer questions. It is thought that there has been a village at Kilmington for over a thousand years. Kilmington is mentioned in the Domesday Book in 1087
